GeneDef.label: malformed head
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene grow highly malformed heads, too small to contain their skull. Starting at the age of 13, they need to wear a helmet that pushes their skull back in at all times, or experience mind-shattering pain.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If carrier is over the age of 13, they will experience ridiculous amounts of pain if their entire head isn't covered.

GeneDef.label: unyielding
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have altered nociception pathways which percieve the same amount of painful stimulus as baseliners, but in a different way that even at its worst is not enough to overwhelm them.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Will never go into pain shock. Can still be downed by other means.

GeneDef.label: mighty hitter
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have muscular hyperplasia, leading to musculature of absurd power, but also size. Their melee strikes will be slow, yet powerful.

GeneDef.label: painstrength
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have noci-receptive and overproductive adrenal glands, allowing their strength to increase proportionately to their pain.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carrier's damage taken decreases and melee damage increases as their pain increases, up to 50% and 200% respectively.
At high levels of pain, also increases movement speed.

GeneDef.label: obligate carnivore
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have dysfunctional enzymes and digestive structures. They will only gain nutrition from meat.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carrier will eat only meat and meals with meat. They won't eat vegetarian meals, even if forced.

GeneDef.label: undiscerning
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have no disgust response to human meat and leather. They will not gain any thoughts from eating human meat or wearing human leather.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Disables "ate human meat" and "wearing human leather" thoughts, including ideoligion-based ones.
